title: The Lady and the owl
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, William Canning and Colin Low
brief_description: From all over Canada people bring injured owls to Kate and Larry McKeevers of Ontario who have devoted the past ten years of their lives to the care of the species. Mrs McKeevers, in particular, is fascinated by them and explains their habits and anatomy. (Award: Columbus)
